message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will significantly contribute to your success. Considering its worth, I propose an initial offer of $1,100,000 for the product. This price reflects a strategic balance between maximizing my earnings while offering you a competitive deal. I look forward to your response and the opportunity to discuss this further.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value you're placing on this product, $1,100,000 is unfortunately a bit higher than my budget allows. I'm very interested in this product, however, and I'm willing to pay $1,000,000 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and am willing to negotiate. After careful consideration, I am pleased to offer you the product for $1,050,000. This price reflects a thoughtful compromise that aims to meet both our financial objectives and your budgetary considerations. I hope this revised offer will be more suitable for you. Please let me know your thoughts.
